title: The Coast
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 30L
description: In The Coast students will read about some of the things located along the coast. Students will have an opportunity to identify the main idea and details in this simple, repetitive story. Detailed, supportive illustrations and the high-frequency word the support early readers.
meta: beach, birds, cliff, coast, lighthouse, ocean, rocks, waves
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Discriminate Initial and Final Consonant Digraphs : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word the
